text: Crystal Marie Reed (born February 6, 1985) is an American actress, best known for playing Allison Argent on the Teen Wolf television series. Reed played Sofia Falcone in the fourth season of Gotham (2017â€“2018) and the lead role of Abby Arcane in the series Swamp Thing (2019). ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Models from Michigan Category:Actors from Detroit Category:English actors
